explains: adj. 腐烂的；衰减的，衰落的
v. 腐烂；衰退（decay 的现在分词）
wordGroup: tooth decay 蛀牙；龋齿；齵齿
decay rate 衰减率；衰变率；衰变速度
in decay 已腐朽，已腐烂
decay resistance 耐腐性，耐腐蚀性能
decay curve 衰变曲线；衰减曲线；退化曲线；余辉曲线
fall into decay 损坏，腐烂；衰败

sentences.en: There, they keep other creatures in check, distribute seeds, and clean dead and decaying materials from the ground.
sentences.cn: 在那里，他们控制着其他生物，播撒种子，并且清理地面上死去和腐烂的东西。

sentences.en: Small business owners often ignore early warning signs of a stagnant market or of decaying profitability.
sentences.cn: 小企业主往往忽视市场停滞或盈利能力下降的早期预警信号。

sentences.en: About the same time, though, scientists realized comets might contain decaying radioactive isotopes that could have warmed cometary interiors to temperatures that caused the interiors to evolve.
sentences.cn: 然而，大约在同一时间，科学家们意识到彗星可能含有衰变的放射性同位素，这些同位素可能使彗星内部的温度升高到导致内部进化的温度。
